data.title: Fast service and good food
data.text: This is one of the best Mexican restaurants in Bowling Green, for sure. The waiters are always friendly, and the menu is reasonably priced.

data.title: Consistently good
data.text: El Mazatlan is consistently good.  Not only is the food tasty but the service fast. Chips and salsa are at the table before a menu can be opened. The waiters and waitresses are always friendly. Give it a try.

data.title: Great food top to bottom
data.text: Excellent food and service. I have been her a dozen times and everything on the menu was excellent. Burritos, tacos you name it all excellent.

data.title: So good
data.text: I have to go here at least once whenever I visit BG, it's just SO good, I've been several times and never had a bad experience and the food is always delicious. Try the tropical fajita!

data.title: Good enchiladas
data.text: We had the enchiladas suizas and supremas for a Sunday night dinner. I enjoyed the green salsa and guac with the suizas. Food always comes out fast here and the chips and salsa are good. It has a nice atmosphere with low lighting.

data.title: Great Mexican food in a clean, casual atmosphere.
data.text: El Maz is our favorite local Mexican restaurant.  The managers and servers interact with patrons, often using bits of their native tongue, even if guests are not Spanish speakers. It is a warm and friendly atmosphere with lunch specials and an extensive dinner menu.  Great choice for lunch or dinner.

data.title: "Love it"
data.text: The best Mexican in BG! Have eaten here several times and everytime the food is good. Have tried several menu items and have enjoyed them all. The only complaint is on occasion the service can be a tad slow.

data.title: just, eh... standard normal frontera-type mexican
data.text: First, there is nothing bad about this place.  But it is normal, regular American Mexican - like Frontera in Georgia or almost any other place you can go.  There are combos, margaritas and chips.  Service was standard, food was hot but standard.  If you like regular Mexican food - then this is your place, but I don't think it was anything to write home about.

data.title: I love this fast paced place for great food and service !
data.text: Oh my goodness , awesome food, very inexpensive, great fast service.  The atmosphere is cool, music a little loud but the food is well worth it.  I had the vegetarian fajitas . I was really impressed of the quality and cleanliness .

data.title: Okay
data.text: The food was prepared well but all the sauce was very plain. I could imagine a bottle of ketchup with some red pepper flakes scattered around. My margaritas were good and the servers were attentive and quick.

data.title: Still the "ONE I LOVE" !!!
data.text: As you'll notice the number of my reviews, it's no small thing that this is my favorite.  Not only is this the most beautiful & comfortable facility, but the service & food quality is EXCELLENT.  The dining area was expanded recently, due to the success of this business.  EM Mazatlan started their first, in this area of KY, a few years ago, and have been highly successful. They continue to expand, as they are putting in a fabulous EL Mazatlan, on Cumberland Trace, where The Catfish House was. I've found food to be consistently EXCELLENT at all locations.

data.title: Best Mexican in Bowling Green
data.text: Without doubt the best Mexican restaurant in town. Yes, everyone can make snobby comments about how "authentic" the Mexican food is. But there are few Mexican restaurants in the US with "true" Mexican food. In terms of what one expects from a Mexican restaurant, this is ideal. Great friendly staff, good food!

data.title: Great experience
data.text:
Excellent!  Great service and great food! Ordered fajitas. They were delish. Huge shrimp
Very good. Would return again when traveling south

data.title: Disappointed...
data.text: I was disappointed. The salsa needs a lot of improvement such as chopped onions, chopped tomatoes and cilantro. My enchiladas suiza were just ok as the chicken was not shredded. I did not care for the little almost cubes of chicken.  Seems as if the chicken was frozen and then warmed up. The owners need to go to Arizona or New Mexico and take courses.

data.title: Must have!
data.text:
I've been to just about every location in Bowling Green and each location offers a unique atmosphere and experience. The Nashville Road location is my family's absolute favorite because of the location, atmosphere, and super friendly service that feels like family. 
The food is amazing and you get so much that it's impossible to eat it all - all for affordable prices. 
The salsa and tortillas are always fresh and taste delicious. 
We love sitting on the patio and enjoying our meal. Go. You won't be disappointed.

data.title: Visit often
data.text: Every location has great food and excellent service. We've been coming here for years and it is always the best.

data.title: Great 1st impression!
data.text: My family & I were in Bowling Green today and decided to try out El Mazatlan.  It was a great first impression.  The decor was really nice.  Better than most Mexican restaurants.  We all kinda ordered safe dishes first time there, but based off of how good they were, I will definitely be branching out a little more the next time we visit.  They had a pretty good size menus with a lot too choose from.  I'm anxious to try something else next time I visit.  My family & I will be going back for sure.

data.title: A favorite
data.text: This place is awesome, I always have to go at least once when I'm staying in Bowling Green, I always get the chimichangas and a margarita, yummy!!

data.title: FAV
data.text: Definitely our favorite group of restaurants in BG. EL Maz always offers great food,  drinks,  and service at any of the restaurants in BG same is true for the Glasgow location

data.title: Excellent Food
data.text: Decided to stop here on our way back to Nashville.  Excellent food and excellent service and very friendly staff and servers.  Some of the best Mexican food I've had.  We will certainly be back whenever we return to Bowling Green and wish we had this restaurant in Nashville!
